function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of undetected SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater due to limitations in concentration and detection methods.","Impact":"Failure to detect the virus in wastewater may result in delayed identification of virus spread in communities.","Mitigation":"Standardize and optimize concentration and detection methods to improve sensitivity and accuracy. Implement quality control measures to ensure reliable results.","Technologies":"Improved concentration methods such as PEG-based separation, ultrafiltration, and standardization of PCR platforms for accurate detection.","People":"Communities relying on wastewater surveillance for early warning of virus spread.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and wastewater treatment facilities."}]}
